items.sentence: Tom spent hours looking at the fish in the tank.
It\'s extremely important to explain the danger.
What Tom is planning to do will make Mary angry.
What Tom really wanted was for Mary to be happy.
What Tom really wanted was some peace and quiet.
I wanted Tom to come to Australia for Christmas.
I wanted Tom to introduce me to all his friends.
Tom pretended he didn\'t know anything about it.
I don\'t think that Tom knows anybody in Boston.
What\'s the name of the company where Tom works?
I think there still is a chance that\'ll happen.
I think you know Tom isn\'t planning to do that.
I don\'t think Tom and Mary are married anymore.
I don\'t think Tom can do that without our help.
You can\'t make Tom help if he doesn\'t want to.
I think Tom won\'t mind if we\'re a little late.
I really should\'ve studied harder for the test.
Tom would\'ve gone with us if we\'d invited him.
Tom doesn\'t know why Mary doesn\'t like Boston.
I didn\'t know how to speak French at that time.
I think it\'s dangerous for children to do that.
I honestly didn\'t think that Tom would be here.
I hope Tom doesn\'t tell Mary about what we did.
I did everything I could to help Tom find a job.
I want to find out what kind of music Tom likes.
I can play both tennis and baseball fairly well.
There is no proof that Tom committed that crime.
How much longer is Tom planning to stay with us?
How much time do you spend reading just for fun?
How often do you eat at an expensive restaurant?
I assume you\'ll be going to the dance with Tom.
Tom is looking for somebody to babysit his kids.
I\'m supposed to make sure Tom knows what to do.
I\'m supposed to meet Tom here in a few minutes.
I\'m sure Tom doesn\'t want to be in Boston now.
I\'m sure Tom won\'t want to go fishing with us.
Does anyone know if the cafeteria is still open?
I know you\'ll enjoy the food at Chuck\'s Diner.
I think it\'s time for you to tell me the truth.
I\'m going to allow Tom to do whatever he wants.
I\'m planning a surprise birthday party for Tom.
Everyone but Tom seems to be enjoying the party.
I can\'t tell you how stupid this makes me feel.
I couldn\'t figure out what Tom was going to do.
Where did you find the inspiration for all this?
Do you really think that I\'m going to help you?
Tom probably won\'t be the first one to do that.
Tom promised he\'d call as soon as he got there.
Do I have to schedule an appointment to see you?
Do you have any idea why Tom refused to do that?
